1. Create Rmarkdown file and save as index.Rmd

2. Build > Configure Build Tools > Webesite

3. .nojekyll text file

4. Copy _site.yml from SIMPLE WEBSITE

5. edit _site.yml to the names of your files

6. Press Build

7. Commit to github

8. In Github online settings change to the gh-pages branch to build the website
